front.title: Guidelines for Authors and Reviewers of YANG Data Model Documents

abstract.t: This memo provides guidelines for authors and reviewers of standardstrack specifications containing YANG data model modules. Applicableportions may be used as a basis for reviews of other YANG data modeldocuments. Recommendations and procedures are defined, which areintended to increase interoperability and usability of NETCONFimplementations which utilize YANG data model modules.
